description: Detects the manipulation of persistent URLs which could execute malicious code Author: Tobias Michalski. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Persistent Outlook Landing Pages
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\* OR *\\Outlook\\Today\\*) AND ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*Stamp AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000001\)") OR winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*UserDefinedUrl))
